de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.svg
Class UpdateRunner

java.lang.Object
  de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.svg.UpdateRunner

public class UpdateRunner
extends Object

Class to handle updates to an SVG plot, in particular when used in an Apache Batik UI.

Author:
Erich Schubert
